```{js echo=FALSE}
// This message is executed first before the js from show-all-postMessage.html

var raw_array_categories = [];
var raw_array_tags = [];
var array_categories = {};
var array_tags = {};

getElements_from_array('.array_categories', raw_array_categories);
getElements_from_array('.array_tags', raw_array_tags);

// Sorting arrays alphabetically
// console.log("raw_array_categories: " +  raw_array_categories)
raw_array_categories.sort();
raw_array_tags.sort();

countElements(raw_array_categories, array_categories);
countElements(raw_array_tags, array_tags);

// Get all the elements store in an array and push it to array name
function getElements_from_array (class_name, array_name){
    document.querySelectorAll(class_name).forEach(item => {
      item_cleaned = item.textContent.trim();
      array_name.push(item_cleaned);
    });
}

// Count same elements in array
function countElements (array_to_be_counted,array_counts){
  array_to_be_counted.forEach(function (x) { array_counts[x] = (array_counts[x] || 0) + 1; });
}

let list_categories = document.getElementById("list-blog-categories");

Object.keys(array_categories).forEach((item) => {
  
  // Skips creating a Category NAME called "All"
  if ( !(item === "All") ){
    let a = document.createElement("a");
    a.className = "category";
    a.href = `#category=${item}`;
    a.setAttribute("id", item);

    var div_name = document.createElement('div');
    div_name.className = "name";
    div_name.innerText = item;
    a.appendChild(div_name);


    var div_count = document.createElement('div');
    div_count.className = "count";
    div_count.innerText = array_categories[item];
    a.appendChild(div_count);

    list_categories.appendChild(a);
  }
});

let list_tags = document.getElementById("list-blog-tags");

Object.keys(array_tags).forEach((item) => {
    let a = document.createElement("a");
    a.className = "tag";
    a.href = `#category=${item}`;
    a.setAttribute("id", item);

    var div_name = document.createElement('div');
    div_name.className = "name";
    div_name.innerText = item;
    a.appendChild(div_name);

    // var div_count = document.createElement('div');
    // div_count.className = "count";
    // div_count.innerText = array_tags[item];
    // a.appendChild(div_count);

    list_tags.appendChild(a);
});


window.addEventListener('scroll', adjustSidebarPosition);
window.addEventListener('resize', adjustSidebarSizeAndPosition);

var sidebar = document.querySelector('.sidebar-blog');
var referenceElement = document.querySelector('.main-content-blog'); // Reference element to align the sidebar with

function adjustSidebarPosition() {
    var triggerPosition = referenceElement.offsetTop;

    if (window.scrollY >= triggerPosition) {
        fixSidebar();
    } else {
        resetSidebarStyle();
    }
}

function fixSidebar() {
    var referenceRect = referenceElement.getBoundingClientRect();
    var adjustment = 54; // Number of pixels to adjust. Experiment with this value.

    sidebar.style.position = 'fixed';
    sidebar.style.top = '0';
    sidebar.style.left = (referenceRect.right + window.scrollX + adjustment) + 'px';
}


function adjustSidebarSizeAndPosition() {
    if (sidebar.style.position === 'fixed') {
        fixSidebar(); // Re-fix the sidebar with updated dimensions and position
    }
}

function resetSidebarStyle() {
    sidebar.style.position = 'relative';
    sidebar.style.top = '';
    sidebar.style.left = '';
}
```
